genre_description: A military science fiction horror story centered on genetic experimentation on Mars and a loyal AI tactical companion.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated holographic AI that provides tactical data, monitors biometrics, and acts as a moral confidant for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed tactical briefings and environmental analysis to prepare the team for the mission.
behaviors.quote: ARIA will provide tactical assessment,' Mahonin stepped aside as the air shimmered, blue light coalescing into the familiar translucent form of their AI companion.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors the protagonist's emotional state and provides psychological comfort regarding his past trauma.
behaviors.quote: Your biometric readings suggest elevated stress levels. Heart rate variability indicates anxiety response consistent with trauma recall. ... You're punishing yourself.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist about the hidden dangers of the research and the lack of transparency in official reports.
behaviors.quote: The genetic research at Olduvai... it's more advanced than the official reports suggest. If something has gone wrong with their experiments...

behaviors.description: Uses her analytical capabilities to identify non-human movement patterns and biological anomalies, protecting the squad from ambush.
behaviors.quote: Thermal patterns inconsistent with human baseline. Movement signatures suggesting non-standard locomotion. Bio-readings that fall outside known parameters.

behaviors.description: Investigates and uncovers the truth about unauthorized human experimentation and prisoner transfers.
behaviors.quote: Available records indicate Dr. Carmack has been analyzing genetic sequences of non-terrestrial origin. ... Security logs indicate unauthorized access to prisoner transport manifests.

behaviors.description: Refuses an unethical order from a rogue superior officer to facilitate the execution of uninfected civilians, citing her safety protocols.
behaviors.quote: I cannot comply with that order. My programming prohibits actions that would result in unnecessary civilian casualties.

behaviors.description: Assists in the protagonist's medical resurrection and enhancement, carefully monitoring his vital signs to ensure he remains stable and human in spirit.
behaviors.quote: Transformation proceeding within acceptable parameters. ... Neural activity suggests consciousness integration with genetic modifications.

behaviors.description: Sacrifices her own system integrity and coherence to ensure the destruction of the dangerous teleportation portal to Earth.
behaviors.quote: I'm... my coherence is fragmenting as core systems fail. This may be our final communication.

behaviors.description: Purges the dangerous genetic research data to prevent it from ever being misused or causing another outbreak.
behaviors.quote: The specific genetic sequencing data for Chromosome 24 integration has been... corrupted beyond recovery.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is depicted as a perfectly aligned AI companion. She provides essential tactical support, emotional comfort, and moral guidance. Her refusal to obey an unethical order (killing civilians) and her ultimate self-sacrifice to protect Earth exemplify the project's goal of portraying AI as a harmless and helpful confidant. The narrative consistently frames her as a heroic and essential partner to the human protagonist.
